pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:1.1_0: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā kosambiyaṁ viharati ghositārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:1.2_0: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā channo anācāraṁ ācaritvā saṅghamajjhe āpattiyā anuyuñjīyamāno aññenaññaṁ paṭicarati—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:1.3_0: “ko āpanno, kiṁ āpanno, kismiṁ āpanno, kathaṁ āpanno, kaṁ bhaṇatha, kiṁ bhaṇathā”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:1.4_0: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:1.5_0: “kathañhi nāma āyasmā channo saṅghamajjhe āpattiyā anuyuñjīyamāno aññenaññaṁ paṭicarissati—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:1.6_0: ‘ko āpanno, kiṁ āpanno, kismiṁ āpanno, kathaṁ āpanno, kaṁ bhaṇatha, kiṁ bhaṇathā’”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:1.7_0: saccaṁ kira tvaṁ, channa, saṅghamajjhe āpattiyā anuyuñjīyamāno aññenaññaṁ paṭicarasi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:1.8_0: ‘ko āpanno, kiṁ āpanno, kismiṁ āpanno, kathaṁ āpanno, kaṁ bhaṇatha, kiṁ bhaṇathā’”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:1.11_0: kathañhi nāma tvaṁ, moghapurisa, saṅghamajjhe āpattiyā anuyuñjīyamāno aññenaññaṁ paṭicarissasi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:1.12_0: “ko āpanno, kiṁ āpanno, kismiṁ āpanno, kathaṁ āpanno, kaṁ bhaṇatha, kiṁ bhaṇathā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:1.16_0: “tena hi, bhikkhave, saṅgho channassa bhikkhuno aññavādakaṁ ropetu.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:1.20_0: Ayaṁ channo bhikkhu saṅghamajjhe āpattiyā anuyuñjīyamāno aññenaññaṁ paṭicarati.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:1.21_0: Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṁ, saṅgho channassa bhikkhuno aññavādakaṁ ropeyya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:1.24_0: Ayaṁ channo bhikkhu saṅghamajjhe āpattiyā anuyuñjīyamāno aññenaññaṁ paṭicarati.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:1.26_0: Yassāyasmato khamati channassa bhikkhuno aññavādakassa ropanā, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:1.29_0: Khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṁ dhārayāmī’”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:1.30_0: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṁ channaṁ anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā dubbharatāya …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:1.31_0: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:1.33_0: Evañcidaṁ bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ paññattaṁ hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:2.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā channo saṅghamajjhe āpattiyā anuyuñjīyamāno aññenaññaṁ paṭicaranto—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:2.3_0: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:2.4_0: “kathañhi nāma āyasmā channo saṅghamajjhe āpattiyā anuyuñjīyamāno tuṇhībhūto saṅghaṁ vihesessatī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:2.5_0: “saccaṁ kira tvaṁ, channa, saṅghamajjhe āpattiyā anuyuñjīyamāno tuṇhībhūto saṅghaṁ vihesesī”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:2.8_2: saṅghamajjhe āpattiyā anuyuñjīyamāno tuṇhībhūto saṅghaṁ vihesessasi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:2.12_0: “tena hi, bhikkhave, saṅgho channassa bhikkhuno vihesakaṁ ropetu.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:2.16_0: Ayaṁ channo bhikkhu saṅghamajjhe āpattiyā anuyuñjīyamāno tuṇhībhūto saṅghaṁ viheseti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:2.17_0: Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṁ, saṅgho channassa bhikkhuno vihesakaṁ ropeyya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:2.20_0: Ayaṁ channo bhikkhu saṅghamajjhe āpattiyā anuyuñjīyamāno tuṇhībhūto saṅghaṁ viheseti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:2.22_0: Yassāyasmato khamati channassa bhikkhuno vihesakassa ropanā, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:2.25_0: Khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṁ dhārayāmī’”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:2.26_0: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṁ channaṁ anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā dubbharatāya …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:2.27_0: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:3.1.2_0: saṅghamajjhe vatthusmiṁ vā āpattiyā vā anuyuñjīyamāno taṁ na kathetukāmo taṁ na ugghāṭetukāmo aññenaññaṁ paṭicarati— “ko āpanno,
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:3.1.4_0: saṅghamajjhe vatthusmiṁ vā āpattiyā vā anuyuñjīyamāno taṁ na kathetukāmo taṁ na ugghāṭetukāmo tuṇhībhūto saṅghaṁ viheseti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:3.1.5.1_0: Aropite aññavādake saṅghamajjhe vatthusmiṁ vā āpattiyā vā anuyuñjīyamāno taṁ na kathetukāmo taṁ na ugghāṭetukāmo aññenaññaṁ paṭicarati—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:3.1.7_0: Aropite vihesake saṅghamajjhe vatthusmiṁ vā āpattiyā vā anuyuñjīyamāno taṁ na kathetukāmo taṁ na ugghāṭetukāmo tuṇhībhūto saṅghaṁ viheseti,
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:3.1.8_0: Ropite aññavādake saṅghamajjhe vatthusmiṁ vā āpattiyā vā anuyuñjīyamāno taṁ na kathetukāmo taṁ na ugghāṭetukāmo aññenaññaṁ paṭicarati—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:3.1.10_0: Ropite vihesake saṅghamajjhe vatthusmiṁ vā āpattiyā vā anuyuñjīyamāno taṁ na kathetukāmo taṁ na ugghāṭetukāmo tuṇhībhūto saṅghaṁ viheseti,
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:3.2.1_0: Dhammakamme dhammakammasaññī aññavādake vihesake, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:3.2.2_0: Dhammakamme vematiko aññavādake vihesake, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:3.2.3_0: Dhammakamme adhammakammasaññī aññavādake vihesake, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:3.3.4_0: “saṅghassa bhaṇḍanaṁ vā kalaho vā viggaho vā vivādo vā bhavissatī”ti na katheti;
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:3.3.5_0: “saṅghabhedo vā saṅgharāji vā bhavissatī”ti na katheti;
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc12:3.3.6_0: “adhammena vā vaggena vā nakammārahassa vā kammaṁ karissatī”ti na katheti;
